1.content:
It was just another day in the United States, until the giant baby showed up.

(Now you can choose the baby's gender and stuff)
1.title: The Beginning

choices: He puts people in his diaper
11.content: It was just another day in New York City, when an 800-foot-tall 2-year-old boy wearing only a plain white diaper mysteriously appeared!
11.title: Boy

choices: A building that may seemingly support him.
In the middle of Times Square.
111.content:
The boy began to walk through the city, carelessly placing his feet down wherever he stepped. The smile on his face only grew wider when he realized how little resistance the tiny structures gave when stepped on. None of them exceeded past the sagging portion of his diaper. Toddling along down a packed, chaos-induced road, many buildings were knocked over by his massive thighs as he tried to fit down the cramped New York City street. Anybody who had managed to find themselves trapped below him had no chance at all as his massive feet reduced them to red pulps when placed down. People who once had lives, families, friends... all of it instantly taken away just so that this enormous little boy could continue his trek across the city.

After a while, the toddler begins to grow weary, and must find a place to sit down and rest his legs and blood-stained feet...
111.title: He destroys things.

choices: The boy falls back and takes a short nap.
The boy plays with the tiny people to keep himself entertained.
1112.content:
Ah yes, Times Square. The giant toddler finally makes his way to the end of the street, leaving nothing but a trail of death and destruction behind him. Blood stained the soles of his feet and the city's streets, cars were completely flattened like they had been scrapped for metal, and buildings were either completely toppled over and stepped on, or ginormous holes had been ripped in the sides of them (sending people tumbling out and into the packed streets below to be stepped on, no doubt). A few very unlucky souls had attempted to cling to the sides of the boy's diaper; after noticing this, the giant toddler slapped his hand down on top of them, reducing them to a mushy paste between the palm of his hand and the stretchy fabric of his soggy diaper.

Planting his feet down on the sides of Times Square, the boy stared down at the bustling crowds of people below him.

Sucks to be them, he thought and giggled.

Turning around, the people stared up at the back of his diapered butt and knew exactly what was about to happen. Human instinct to survive had kicked into overdrive at this point, and their panic only created twice as much chaos as before. Blood-curdling screams could be heard as he was setting himself down, and eventually, the inevitable had arrived for the lost souls trapped below. The white fabric of the diaper slowly pushed them into the concrete, and as the boy shifted back and forth to make himself comfortable, the little ones that he had sat on burst instantly.

That's better, the boy thought and sighed in content at the relief he felt in his leg muscles.
1112.title: In the middle of Times Square.

choices: he found he had grown even bigger
he saw another giant baby his age
11121.content: The enormous toddler laid down and fell fast asleep. When he woke up....
11121.title: The boy falls back and takes a short nap.

choices: Rampaged some more until he was all tired out
Grew bigger and destroyed some more
Grew bigger and felt hungry again
11122.content: The giant toddler's stomach rumbled loudly. "Tummy need food!" the massive little boy said before he began grabbing people, vehicles, and chunks of buildings and devouring them until his belly was stuffed. Next he....
11122.title: Oh no, he's getting hungry...

choices: Destroy this city and move on.
112.content:
Panic flooded the streets of New York as the tot strolled into the city, carelessly stepping on countless cars and people below him. His feet left craters almost twenty feet deep with each step he took, and compacted at the bottom of each footprint were countless tiny people who hadn't been able to avoid his tread.

This amused the boy, who had suddenly gained interest in a city bus sitting alongside one of the busy roads with its' hazard lights on. Crouching down to get a better look, his heavy diaper pressed people against the pavement as he picked up the bus. Now deciding to sit down, those who had been trapped with very little breathing room now found the tot's immense weight squishing the life out of them; they popped like little ants under his diaper-clad butt.

Bringing the bus up to his face, he watched a couple people jump from the doors of the bus and free-fall to their doom. He giggled as they splattered on the pavement. Examining his new toy, the giant kid held his thumbs over the front and rear doors, so that nobody else could escape. Not to mention the windows were much too tiny for any person to fit through. He had them trapped, and after realizing this he tore the roof off and tossed it into the side of a building. As if it was instinct, the boy plummeted his hand down into their squirming midst and raised a hand full of people up to his mouth and licked them. Grinning, he hummed as he quickly stuffed his face with the screaming captives, his teeth making quick work of their flesh and tearing them to shreds. Some unfortunate souls were swallowed alive, unharmed, and ultimately would suffer a much more painful death in the boy's acid-filled stomach.

Burping, the giant tot tossed the now-empty bus aside and giggled as it crushed several more fleeing people.
112.title: He devours everything in sight.

113.content: The titanic tot began scooping up people and cars and stuffing them into his massive diaper. Once had collected about 100 people in his diaper, he.....
113.title: He puts people in his diaper

choices: A secret base in the Pacific
A spaceship full of other giant babies
A dimension where a god-like baby lived
1133.content: The enormous young tike suddenly took to the sky! He flew to.....
1133.title: Flew off

11333.content: The enormous toddler flew out into the cosmos until he reached an alien dimension populated by other giant babies who ranged from 700 feet to 20 miles tall. In the center of this realm, on a massive golden throne, sat a 100-mile-tall baby with glowing golden skin and 20 angelic wings who wore an ornate crown. "I brought back some more adults." said the 800-foot-tall baby. "Very good." said the god-like baby. As a reward, our massive toddler protagonist was.....
11333.title: A dimension where a god-like baby lived

choices: Capture a planet and bring it back to him
113333.content:
The god-like toddler told our protagonist baby, "as you know, each time one comes back successful from their mission, they're given a gift of superpowers as well as more height. Since you have done so I shall bestow upon you the ability of heat-beam eye blasts." He waved his mighty golden scepter and his powers were delivered to him. But the god-like baby wasn't done as he snapped his fingers and a golden glow surrounded the other baby, causing him to grow to 1000 ft. tall.

Now even though he had been grown, the protagonist baby was still a tad disappointed. The god-like baby saw this and asked him, "why do you look so sad?" He responded by saying, "I just thought that I was going to be grown more than this." The god-like baby reminded him that if he wanted to be grown bigger he would have to complete more missions. He also added that the more complex the mission was, the more powers and growth he would receive if he is successful.

"I want to be grown a lot," the protagonist baby said "so what would I have to do to achieve it?" The god-like baby pondered this thought and eventually come up with a mission for him. He wanted him to...
113333.title: Grown bigger and given super-powers

1133332.content: "You will be rewarded if you shrink Earth and bring it to me" the god baby said. "I will then begin to grow it back. You can do this or not its up to you" the god baby concluded as he waited for the protagonist baby to make a choice.
1133332.title: Capture a planet and bring it back to him

choices: The military attempts to stop him before reaching the city.
115.content:
It had been a normal day for two-year-old Jonathan. He spent his morning playing in the backyard on his tricycle, only stopping here and there to stomp a little anthill into oblivion. After he had finished that, he had managed to tire himself out; when his mother came to put him down for his daily nap, he had no trouble whatsoever going to sleep after getting his diaper changed.

In the boy's dreams, a glowing alien-like had appeared to him and stated that he would be, "the conquerer of all humanity." Visions had come to him in this dream sequence of massive cities crumbling below his feet as he stomped on them, ending millions of lives all at once. Shortly after this, the boy began to awake from his nap, only now, he was no longer in his little trailer home in Oregon. He lay almost entire naked (except for his diaper), in the middle of a farm field somewhere in rural New York. It was then that he remembered his dream and began to come to his senses about just what had happened to him whilst he napped peacefully.

Standing up and admiring the minuscule farmhouse nearby, he walked casually over to it until it was directly below his feet. By this point, the farmer and his wife and two children were standing out on the porch looking up at the giant toddler. They had a phenomenal view of the soiled diaper dangling in between his legs. They continued to stare up as he glanced down and began to lift his foot. It was then that they understood what was about to happen--well, not exactly understood, but they seemed to have accepted their fate. Raising his foot up high, the boy stomped down on the little house (and its occupants standing outside) and twisted his foot back and forth.

Smiling, he walked across the landscape, and he would soon reach New York City, his true destination.
115.title: Reveal the story behind this.

choices: Ordered the tiny people to worship him
1151.content: Johnathan stomped through the countryside, crushing countless houses and people beneath his enormous feet. Finally, he arrived in New York City. The tiny people began screaming in terror at the sight of the colossal baby boy. Johnathan....
1151.title: The toddler's arrival.

choices: Jonathan keeps walking, pondering the ideas.
11513.content:
As another farmhouse had vanished underneath of his feet, Jonathan began to remember sequence in his dream. He recalled how the alien-like creature had wanted him to conquer the tiny inferior humans, and make them realize that they should be honored to be stepped on, or eaten, or sat on, or played with, or any damn thing that Jonathan wants to do to them! These little bugs should be on their knees bowing before him, practically BEGGING for his attention!

The giant tot quickly decided that as soon as he stumbled upon a large city, he would display a rightful show of power and dominance, and then make them bow.

They need to know what their new god is capable of first.
11513.title: Ordered the tiny people to worship him.

choices: Chases after the people on foot.
115131.content:
Treading across farmland, the over-sized toddler finally saw some very tall buildings in the distance, just over a hill. With that, he took off barreling straight for the city. Uncaring of what was stepped on, Jonathan left deep impressions of his feet wherever he walked, occasionally feeling a stray car crunch under his heel, or an unfortunate tiny person burst like a grape underneath the balls of his feet.

Giggling as he made his approach, he made a show for the suburban neighborhood below as he purposefully raised his feet up as high as he could and stomping down on the houses and people in streets. Once people had grasped what was happening, they began loading into their vehicles and attempting to drive away. Some of them fled on foot, figuring that it would be easier to escape with no traffic.

Jonathan...
115131.title: Jonathan finds a city.

1151312.content:
Deciding the ones on foot would be easier to capture, the tot followed them. He made sure to take his time and crush any car or stray pedestrian under his feet as he did so. He began to notice a large group of fleeing people forming in front of him, and he couldn't help but laugh. All he had to do was walk at his own ease and simply step on them with no effort whatsoever, meanwhile he knew that they were running for their lives, exerting all the energy they had to get away from this giant kid.

He chased them for several more minutes, letting the group accumulate in size even more. When Jonathan had finally had enough, he easily stepped over top of the crowd at his feet, placing a single foot directly in front of them. Some of the ones at the head of crowd slammed into the side of his giant heel, making Jonathan giggle at the sudden panic. Getting down on his knees, he loomed over top of them. Reaching behind him, the giant plunged one of his hands inside of a house and dragged it forward, lining it along the crowd in the street so that they could not escape. After doing the same on the other side, he surveyed the crowd now. They were panicking much more now, especially since they had realized that they are trapped and now entirely at the mercy of their new toddler ruler, who is currently....
1151312.title: Chases after the people on foot.

choices: Scooted forward, crushing them under his diaper.
Reached for them, hoping to have a quick snack.
11513122.content:
Looking overhead, the little people screamed in terror as their vision was filled with the underside of a toddler's soiled diaper. Those directly under his massive behind were squished to goo before he had even settled his weight on top of them; his diaper doing most of the work for him. Sitting himself down, he felt the semi-crushed people crush further as his weight rested on top of them.

Jonathan giggled.

Noticing a tiny group of survivors in between his legs, he watched them as they tried to pull one of their own out from underneath the front of his diaper; Jonathan had sat on this person's legs, but they were still alive. They thought that they hadn't received the giant's attention, but unbeknownst to them, they had.

Deciding to put a stop to their little rescue mission, the giant baby promptly...
11513122.title: Starting to sit on them.

choices: She is terrorizing New York City, New York
Go to Baby-Girlzilla Island (where she is held captive)

12.content:
Towering over 200ft tall, wearing a pink diaper, was a terror unlike any other. It was named Konia, but her actual name is Baby-Girlzilla? Why, because she is a giant monster lover, and this was her favorite day (she might be a generic giant monster in this one, but you can make her do fun stuff) for her parents that let her watch giant monster flicks. No one knew how this girl came to be, but some say it was a scientist experiment that went wrong and she grew to kaiju-size. There is even more to it. She can give out a monster like roar, fire an atomic breath from her mouth, and nothing can stop her pretty much in terms of weapons. She has black hair and pale skin.

"RWAR!!!!!!!!" she roared.

What do you want to do with Baby-Girlzilla?

142121222.content: You decide that there is no way that you can fight your now BIG little brother and sister so you say "ok diaper me". "Wow that was easy I thought you were going to resist" Emily said. "Yeah we were ready to give you a spanking" Adam said as he picked up one of his diapers. You were glad you gave up a spanking is not what you wanted at all. At the same time Adam picked up one of his diapers Emily picked up one of her diapers. "I want Fred to be in one of my princess diapers" Emily said. "Well I want him in a race car diaper" Adam said. You looked at the big toddlers fighting over which diaper to put you in when....
142121222.title: Accept your diapered fate

1421212221.content: Suddenly they both looked at you and said "little Freddy what diaper do you want". "Mine is pretty pink and has your favorite disney princess Cinderella on it" Emily said shaking the big diaper in front of your face. It smelled like fresh baby powder and soap. "Yeah well mine has race cars on it and it is blue like boys like it, whats wrong Freddy do you not like boy things? Would you rather be a sissy and wear one of Emily's girly diapers" Adam teased. You looked at both diapers and decided you wanted to wear...
1421212221.title: They ask you what diaper you want.

choices: Lets get you into some more clothes (girls clothes)
14212122212.content: You point to Emily's pretty pink princess diaper and say "I want to wear Emily's princess diaper". "Awe that is so cute Freddy I cant wait to diaper you and see you in my little princess diapers, we can be twins" Emily said as she picked you up and took you into another room to diaper you. Adam watched as she left with you and said "Fred you are just a sissy girl, now the rest of the boy babies and I will tease you cause we are real boys and we are bigger". That rang in you ears as Emily lied you down in her room and began to diaper you. "Dont worry little Freddy the girls and I will protect you from those mean boys we like it when boys act like girls its way more fun" Emily said as she finished diapering you. "There all diapered just like goddess Anna wanted, whats next" Emily said. "Oh I know...."
14212122212.title: Emily's Disney princess diapers

142121222121.content:
"Oh I know we could get you into some clothes no one likes going around in just a diaper" Emily said. "That sounds like a great idea Emily, but none of my clothes will fit over this diaper!" you said. "Hehehe baby Freddy is so cute." Emily said pinching your cheek. "You will wear some of my clothes." she said going to her closet, leaving you on the changing table. "Wait, what, no, a girl diaper is one thing but girl clothes? I think not, plus they wont fit me." you said sitting up. "Freddy, if you refuse me I am going to spank you, anyway, they will fit you because diaper goddess Anna will grow them to fit you" Emily said, exiting the closet with a pink dress with flowers on it.
What do you do?
142121222121.title: Lets get you into some more clothes (girls clot...

choices: She grabbed you and laid you over her knee
1421212221211.content: "No, Emily, I am not wearing girl clothes!" you said loudly. "Wrong answer, Freddy!" Emily replied as....
1421212221211.title: Resist Emily

choices: You give in and wear the dress
14212122212111.content: Emily laid you over her knee and began spanking your bottom. "Ow, Emily, that hurts!" you said. "I'll stop if you agree to wear the dress." she replied.
14212122212111.title: She grabbed you and laid you over her knee

choices: Lets go hang out with the other babies
142121222122.title: Other

choices: Before Emily could finish Anna turned you into a girl
Adam comes in with his friends to tease you
1421212221222.title: Other

1423.content: Lavender was once a one-inch-tall fairy baby, until she touched a strange gem and grew 900 feet tall! Lavender has blue eyes and curly red hair and wings like a swallowtail butterfly. She wears only a plain pink diaper. Lavender isn't malicious, but she is playful, and she's thrilled at being the bigger one for once. Her parents are trying to stop her, but as long as they are normal fairy-sized, it's an exercise in futility.
1423.title: How about some other giant baby girl?

14232.content: Okay, here is a cute one. Nene, with brown hair, levander eyes, and wearing a pink diaper. She is 200ft tall, and for some reason she can speak full sentences and stuff. She is a super nice girl, and is willing to help out her town and other people, and even play as well with the young kids. At least she was potty trained, etc.
14232.title: Nene, nicest giant baby ever

choices: Show how she became a giant baby
Show her playing with some kids at a park
Show her helping the people in her town with a construction project
142321.content: So, what should we show Nene the friendly giant baby doing?
142321.title: Nene, nice giant baby

choices: Controlling a giant baby in the park
1423212.content:
Nene was right now seen playing with many young and small children in the park by laying down on her back with her head facing upwhere. Nene is truly popular with the kids in a lot of big ways as she was not only seen as a giant monster icon for kids, but also a very nice and friendly person. She was truly smart beyond her years as she was able to understand what the kids were saying and can even talk fluently herself.

"So Nene, what do you wanna play?" Asked by one of the children.

"Yeah, what do you like doing the most?"

"I can give y'all the choice of two games." Nene said just as the children gets off her and begins to stand at her full height. "We could go to the virtual city on my island and y'all can see me rampage around like a giant monster, or we could play a game of simon says, with you telling me what to do? What do you want me to do?"

(If Simon says... remember that it is in the park.)

The children decided.
1423212.title: Show her playing with some kids at a park

choices: She is on Gamora Island, roaming around, doing stuff
She is in a city, defending it from a giant baby
143.content:
Alright, here is another girl. This one has tan skin, is 200ft tall, and has red hair and blue eyes. She wears a white diaper with the character Gamera on it. She is the Gamera baby named Gamora, so she strives to defend the world from all sorts of giant baby threats, like Konia for example. She can roar like a monster, breath fire, and her body and diaper are hard to take down. Also, unlike other babies, she takes her monster self seriously, so she isn't going to play around. She means business. She is loved by the children of the world, and her name was given to her by them. Gamora!

So, what is she doing at this moment?
143.title: Gamera Baby

144.content:
What if we had a baby girl with tan skin, green hair, 300ft tall, but is a giant robot that loves causing baby carnage, but also at same time rampaging like an actual giant monster with Mechagodzilla's voice? Meet Mecha-Lunazilla, a giant baby girl made by aliens to destroy Earth. She behaves like a giant monster, looks like a human baby girl, but has tons of weapons, and wears a white diaper. Her favorite thing to do is grab buses of people and bring them close to her face, so she can just roar at them and keep them scare all the time.

Want to use her?
144.title: Mecha-Babyzilla

1442.content: Matt is a 100-mile-tall baby who emerged from beneath the Himalayas. He has blond hair and blue eyes and wears a glowing golden diaper and a purple cape. He can do whatever the author wants. You can reveal his origins, or leave that a mystery.
1442.title: More Options

14422.content: Koyuki is a 200ft baby with the ability to speak in full sentences and has the highest IQ in the entire world. Basically she knows how to destroy, how to roar, how to do everything a baby can do. Heck, she can stand on her two feet. She is the only baby (2 years old) to wear a pink bra and panties instead of a diaper. She enjoys thinking up ways to destroy cities.
14422.title: Smart-Koyuki

14423.content:
Okay, meet Soya, as baby who was just born, but in an extraordinary amount of time, within a few weeks. She is already moving on her two feet, and is able to speak in full sentences and understand alot of things. She has brown hair and red eyes, and is 150ft tall. Basically she is the youngest baby, but she already developed without needing to learn. She wears a pink diaper, and lives somewhere in the forest where she resides in Yellowstone park. It seems she is extremely smart like Koyuki, but still... she is a child and a fun loving one at that. Loves to use her new size, etc.

So, want to use Soya? She develop those skills without problems at all, and stuff?
14423.title: A new type of baby

145.content:
Okay, here are some more choices here my friend.

Kayumi: A 200ft Japanese toddler girl with blackish green hair and green eyes. She just wears a plain white diaper. She somehow grew after being exposed to a chemical at a factory, and as a result grew big and gain powers. She currently lives in Tokyo. A twist to her is that she never ages past her baby appearance so she can live on for years.

Erica: A 1 year old toddler girl who lived in the prehistoric age. She was nearly killed with the dinosaurs but instead of dying, she grew from the radiation of the meteor. She has blonde hair, fair skin, and red eyes. Her size is unknown, but she currently is still alive in modern times, and acts very feral.
145.title: More choices

15.content: Okay, here is a funny scneario that could work. Remember the babies from Rugrats? Well just think of them somehow during a play session, somehow a radioactive truck crashed into their home by accident and sprayed all of the Rugrats (including Tommy especially) with the radioactive toxic waste? Then they all grew to 200ft in height and develop superpowers? Just imagine the chaos that can spread from this one. Want to do this one.
15.title: The entire Rugrats cast?

151.content:
It started off as a regular day at the Pickle’s house. Tommy was sitting in his play pen and Dil was being fed by his mother Didi. Stu was sitting at the table reading the newspaper and drinking coffee. Then the doorbell rang and Stu got up to answer it. It was Chaz, Betty, and Kira with Phil, Lil, Chuckie and Kimi. Chaz and Betty put the kids down in the play pen to play with Tommy. Then they went into the kitchen to talk with Stu and Betty. The kids started pushing a ball around, then there was a loud crash. A truck crashed into the wall and sprayed the five kids with a green substance. The waste instantly absorbed into their bodies and the kids started crying. The parents rushed in as soon as they heard the crash. They rushed over to the kids and calmed them down. They took the kids outside to play. After making sure the kids were all right, they all confronted the driver. Didi held Dil in her arms.

The driver came out of the cab and apologized to everyone, but they wanted none of it. As they were screaming at the driver the kids were talking outside. They started to feel tingly and they all started glowing green. They gradually started to grow. The parents were still yelling at the driver when they heard another loud crash. They saw Phil’s shoe crash through the wall. They quickly ran outside and watched in shock as the kids grew. Soon enough the kids were standing at 200 feet tall. Tommy’s house and the houses on either side were flattened already.

The neighbors came out upon hearing the ruckus. They stood in shock at the sight of 5 babies above their city. The kids looked down at everyone and smiled. This sent the people into a panic. Dil was smiling in Didi’s arms (he didn’t grow because he was in the kitchen when the crash happened). The first power they realized they had was the ability to talk with an adult’s vocabulary but they still thought the city was a toy.

“Look at the little bugs run”, yelled Phil. “Yeah they’re cute, but we have a whole toy city to play with, said Kimi. “I don’t think that’s a good idea guys, said Chuckie. The others looked at him. Tommy told him, “Don’t worry, they’re just toys Chuckie.” Most started running away when Tommy said this, but Stu, Didi, Chaz, Kira, and Betty stayed behind staring at their kids.

The babies noticed that a few didn’t run. Phil reached down and picked up them all up. He lifted them up to his face and smiled at them. "I’ll save you bugs for later." He shoved them into his shirt pocket.

The kids started walking after the people that were running. Tommy was in front, then Phil and Lil, Kimi was next and Chuckie at the back. Soon enough they passed Tommy’s cousin Angelica’s house. When Tommy saw that this dollhouse looked like Angelica’s he immediately got upset. He was thinking of all the times Angelica bullied him and his friends. He sat down on the house and it crumbled beneath his diaper. Tommy giggled at crushing a building

That was when he noticed three bugs near his feet, Angelica, Drew, and Charlotte. Upon seeing the bug that looked like Angelica, he quickly picked her up and brought her to his face. “You look just like my mean cousin Angelica.” He smiled as he knew what to do with her. He stood up and walked over to Lil. He told Lil that he had a juicy bug for her to eat. She smiled and took the bug from Tommy. Without really looking at it, she lifted it up to her mouth. Angelica was begging for the babies to let her live, but Lil continued bringing Angelica to her mouth. Lil opened up her mouth and tossed the screaming Angelica inside.

With a loud ‘gulp’, Lil swallowed Angelica whole. Everyone could see the bulge in her throat as Angelica slid towards Lil’s stomach. Once inside, she started struggling and banging on the walls. Lil just laughed at the little ’bugs’ struggles. After a few minutes, Angelica was nothing but mush in Lil’s stomach. Lil said, “Wow Tommy, that bug was really good.”

The kids looked around the city wondering what to do first.
151.title: Giant Rugrats

1511.content:
The little kids looked around and smiled thinking of how much fun it would be to play like their favorite monster Reptar. Tommy went back to pick up Drew and Charlotte. They were terrified after seeing Lil eat Angelica. Tommy handed them off to Phil and he placed them in his pocket with the others. “Now we can be just like Reptar, yelled Phil. Chuckie was worried about hurting their ‘toys’. The others told him that they were just toys and they wouldn’t be hurt. Still Chuckie decided to stay put and sat down. He ended up crushing a couple houses beneath him.

Tommy, Phil, Lil, and Kimmi walked toward the main city, leaving massive footprints in the street. Kimmi found a few toys and started walking after them. As she caught up, she reached down and scooped up several people. She smiled at them and stretched out her diaper and dropped them inside. She continued until she had the whole group trapped. She found a local daycare, sat down, ripped off the roof, and deposited all the captives inside. She giggled happily as she played with her new toys.

Tommy, Phil, Lil split up to do their own thing. Tommy walked off to his own portion of the city. The people screamed at the sight of him in his massive diaper. He just smiled at the toys then his tummy growled. That’s when he noticed the local milk factory nearby. He stomped over and sat down with a loud boom. He ripped off the roof and smiled at the workers inside. The people panicked and ran for the exits. Tommy ignored them and picked up a vat of milk. He started guzzling it down until it was empty. He went from vat to vat until the whole factory was empty. His tummy was full, and he let out a loud burp. He sat down, crushing the factory beneath his diaper, and watched as Phil and Lil played, and he rubbed his full belly.

Phillip didn’t really like wearing pants. So he took them off and partially exposed his diaper. He thought back to when he watched Tommy crush a house earlier. He wondered what it would be like. He found another two story house. He lifted up his foot and stepped on it. The building collapsed into match sticks. Phil just giggled and yelled, “That was fun”. He and Lil walked into downtown. Phil saw another building about half his size. He smiled and just walked right through it. He rampaged through the city, destroying buildings anyway he could think off. After a while, his legs were getting tired. He found another building that reached his knees. He ripped off the roof and smiled at the terrified toys inside. He sat down on the building and the captives screamed as they watched a massive diaper coming toward them. It only took a few seconds for the building to collapse under his weight. Phil sat amongst the rubble smiling at the fact he had destroyed dozens of buildings.

Lilian had watched her brothers rampage and smiled. Now she was wondering what to do. She always loved the feeling of bugs crunching beneath her. She looked over at her brother and yelled out “Watch this Phillip”. She lifted up her shoe and slammed it down. There was a crunch and red juice spurted out from beneath it as she crushed several people. She just giggled and continued stomping on any ‘bug’ she found. When she found a well sized crowd, she smiled. These people started running from this killer toddler. As they turned the corner they found their escape route blocked by rubble from Phil’s rampage. Then Lil come up behind them and sealed the trap. She smiled and yelled “bye bye little bugs”. She turned around and sat down crushing several beneath her diaper. She giggled as they crunched beneath her. She stood up and sat down again, killing even more. She kept doing this until every last captive was a stain on her diaper. She giggled and yelled “Bugs squish beneath diaper”.

Kimmi had been watching as well and thought it looked fun. Tommy walked over from the milk factory, destroying several buildings in the process. Kimmi stood up and looked down at her toys in the daycare. She smiled at them causing her captives to wonder what was going to happen. Kimmi turned around and the captives screamed as they looked up at her massive diaper. Kimmi sat down crushing the building and her captives. She giggled and then walked over to her friends.

The four babies looked around at the destruction already caused, but there was still plenty of fun left. Tommy let out a loud roar like Reptar. As he did, he fired a beam of energy that destroyed a few nearby buildings. Everybody, even Tommy was surprised at what happened. The others tried roaring as well. Just like with Tommy, they each fired a beam of energy. They smiled and rampaged through the city together. It wasn’t long before the entire city was destroyed.

Chuckie had been watching as his friends played. He thought it did look fun. He stood up and walked over to his friends. He asked if he could join in their fun. They all said sure. They looked around and smiled at the destruction they had caused. Then they noticed another city not too far away. They all smiled and started walking towards this new toy city.
1511.title: Reptar Rampage

15112.content:
The five babies were walking towards the new city when Tommy began feeling strange. He grabbed his stomach and started groaning. First his skin turned green. Then his toes turned into sharp claws, and his fingers followed suit. Then he began growing a snout and grew sharp teeth as well. Then spikes started growing out his back and ripping his shirt to shreds. Then a tail ripped through his diaper, yet it was able to stay intact.

The others had a look of surprise on their faces. “How did that happen to you” asked Chuckie. “It must’ve been something from that green stuff that spilled on us”, replied Tommy. Phil reached into his pocket and took the captives out to put them on his shoulders. As if on cue, the others started changing as well. Chuckie’s pants also ripped as the spikes grew. The others noticed that he was wearing a white diaper like the others. When asked about it, he said that his dad decided to put him back in diapers for a while When it was all done, all five babies looked like Reptar.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Reptar#/me...

“Now we look like Reptar” yelled Lil. The others smiled and walked toward the new city. When they arrived, they smiled at their little toys. The people looked up at five dinosaur like babies wearing nothing but white diapers. They all started running in absolute panic.

The babies heard the roar of a jet fly by. As they turned, they noticed an airport nearby. Chuckie smiled and stomped over towards the airport. Tommy, Kimmi, and the twins decided to watch what was going to happen. They sat down and crushed a few small buildings. Chuckie stomped down on the runway making sure that nobody else escaped. There was a line of several planes waiting for takeoff, plus many more at the gates, were trapped. Chuckie sat down and grabbed the next plane in line. He started flying the plane around him. After a few minutes he stuffed the plane inside his diaper. By now the people in other planes started to flee. Chuckie just smiled and started walking after them. He would stomp on the plane and then scoop up any survivors and shove them into his diaper as well.

He walked over to the airport and smiled at the people inside. Chuckie started shoving more people into his diaper. Then he felt his diaper starting to fill. The people inside were desperately trying to swim, but it was all in vain. The people in the airport screamed as they watched the diaper sag. Chuckie opened the front of his diaper and smiled at the dead people inside. Then he smiled at the people inside the airport. He sat down, crushing people inside his diaper and in the airport, and parts of the terminal. He continued doing this until most of the airport was destroyed. He roared out his beam of energy, igniting the rest of the building. He stood up and walked over to his friends smashing through the control tower. He walked over to his friends and said that that was fun.

Tommy and Kimmi decided to go play with the city. Chuckie and the twins decided to sit down to rest and watch. Tommy and Kimmi started walking after the people screaming. Tommy reached down and picked up several people. He opened up his diaper and dropped his toys inside. He was giggling as the people squirmed inside. Kimmi smiled and reached down to pick up a few people as well. She too dropped the people into her diaper for safe keeping. When they were done, both of them had dozens of captives in their diaper. Their captives were praying that neither had to have their diapers changed soon. Those who had kids knew that it was bound to happen soon enough.

They saw that there were a couple buildings that were about level with their diapers. Since they were tired from walking after their toys, they decided to sat down and enjoy their toys. Both of them walked over to a building and ripped off the roof. They sat down and smiled in delight. The people in the building seats had their view filled with the babies’ diapers. Then they heard what sounded like water running, and people screaming. They quickly realized the horrifying truth that both babies were peeing into his/her diaper. They were giggling as they felt the squirming intensify, and then it slowly stopped. When they were done, they patted the wet front of their sagging diapers. They giggled as they heard the sloshing sound of wet diapers. They opened up their diapers and found that their all their captives had drowned. The walls started cracking from the added weight. The people inside started panicking. Then the buildings collapsed into rubble, yet somehow none of their diaper captives were squished.

Tommy and Kimmi giggled as they sat amongst the rubble. After a few minutes, they both stood up and their diapers sagged several feet. By now the diapers were getting annoying, so they told the tiny people to change them. Chuckie walked over and told them that he needed changing as well. Tommy, Chuckie and Kimmi walked over to a Babies R’ Us. They ripped off the roof and grabbed some wipes, baby powder, and diapers. The supplies grew to their proper size and the diapers had a whole for their tails. A few hundred people stepped forward to change them. Tommy, Chuckie and Kimmi sat down and lay down on separate streets, damaging several buildings. Then they spread their legs so it would be easier to change them but their legs plowed through a few buildings as well.

Their changers started off by sliding a clean diaper beneath them. Then they undid the Velcro and let it fall to the ground. They ignored the dead bodies inside and used the diaper to clean the kids. Then they finished cleaning them with some wipes. The next step was to fold the diaper in half and take it to the nearby city dump. Finally, they sprinkled on the baby powder and pulled the diapers up to their waist and did up Velcro tight.

Tommy, Chuckie and Kimmi sat up and looked at the little bugs. They thought that the people did a good job and let them run off. They walked over to the twins and sat down. By now it was getting late and they all were getting tired. They lay down, crushing dozens of buildings, and they drifted off to sleep.
15112.title: Reptar Diaper Change

151121.content:
As the kids slept soundly amongst the rubble of dozens of buildings, the captives on Phil’s shoulders were debating. The parents were discussing if they should run. “It’s only a couple feet to the ground and we can get help” said Chaz. Stu said that there wasn’t really anything that could be done. The world was now just a toy for five toddlers. He also added that it was safer to be on Phil’s shoulder and they wouldn’t be accidently crushed as their kids played. The others agreed and just sat on Phil’s shoulders. After a few hours, the kids started to stir.

They stood up to their full height and let the rubble fall of them. They looked around at the city and smiled. The five babes walked down the street. The twins found a group of a few hundred people. Tommy told them to shove them into their diapers because it really tickles. Phil reached down and picked up about a dozen people. He opened up his diaper and dropped them inside. Phil giggled as they squirmed inside. Lil picked up some people and shoved them into her diaper. She started giggling as well. When they stopped, over 200 people were in either Phil or Lil’s diaper.

While the twins were collecting toys, the others played with the city. Tommy yelled out, “This is gonna be fun”. With that he walked straight through a building that was half his height. He giggled as it crumbled to the ground. Then Kimmi found a small house that was only about two stories tall. She lifted her foot and stomped on the house and giggled as it collapsed. Chuckie found a building that reached a little way past his knees. He ripped off the roof and smiled at the little people inside. He sat down and the people screamed as his diaper came towards them. The building held up for a little bit, but then it too crumbled. The three kids continued sitting and stepping on buildings across the city. Once Phil and Lil were done they joined in on the rampage.

Then the sound of Chuckie’s stomach growling echoed around the city. As the others turned around, their tails smashed through a building. “You hungry Chuckie”, asked Kimmi. Chuckie nodded his head. One by the one, the others realized they were hungry too. Tommy, Chuckie and Kimmi walked over to a nearby restaurant. Kimmi ripped off the roof and tossed it aside. The place was abandoned, but there was plenty of food. The three kids started stuffing themselves with anything they could grab, including the tables and chairs. In about a minute the place was down to the walls. The kids just grabbed them and shoved them into their mouths as well. Their teeth had no problem ripping the concrete apart. The restaurant didn’t fill them up and so they went to another, and another until about a dozen restaurants were eaten. When they were done, they sat down and inadvertently crushed several buildings beneath their diapers.

As the others were eating buildings, the twins wanted something else. They always loved eating bugs and now they had hundreds at their feet. Phil and Lil each picked up one unfortunate person. Both of them panicked and struggled in the giant toddlers’ grasp. Phil and Lil lifted their snack to their faces and smiled. Both were begging their captors to let them go. They even offered to change the kids’ diapers whenever needed. Phil and Lil just ignored them and said, “You look yummy”. With that they tossed their captives into their mouths. They rolled them around with their tongue and sucked and savored their morsels flavor. When the flavor was gone, they tilted their heads back and gulped them down alive. The people screamed as they watched a bulge appear and slid down their throats. Both Phil and Lil smiled and said that the bug was delicious. They giggled as the bugs squirmed in their stomachs. They started grabbing handfuls of screaming people and shoving them into their mouths to be eaten. Soon they each had eaten over hundred people.

They rubbed their tummies at the feeling of bugs squirming inside. They noticed a couple nearby buildings and decided to sit on top and enjoy their snacks. They both ripped the roof off their targeted building and sat down. The people screamed as the blue sky was replaced by a babies white diaper. After a few minutes the squirming stopped as the remnants were turned to mush. They both let out a loud burp which blew away the top floors of a building across the street.

Then they felt that they were peeing into their diapers. Their captives were desperately trying to swim, but eventually drowned. The people in the back looked on in horror, and the kids were not done. They started pushing and a large log pushed out of their butts. The people screamed as the turd fell into the diapers. This caused the diapers to sag and the people in the building screamed. They pushed several more logs into their diapers until they were done and all inside the diapers were dead. Then the buildings started creaking from the additional weight added in their diapers. Then they collapsed into rubble and the kids just giggled away.

Phil and Lil giggled as they sat amongst the rubble. After a few minutes, they both stood up and their diapers sagged several feet. By now the diapers were getting annoying, so they told the tiny people to change them. Phil and Lil walked over to a Babies R’ Us. They ripped off the roof and grabbed some wipes, baby powder, and diapers. The supplies grew to their proper size and the diapers had a hole for their tails. A few hundred people stepped forward to change them. The twins sat down and then lay down on separate streets, damaging several buildings. Then they spread their legs so it would be easier to change them but their legs plowed through a few buildings as well.

Their changers started off by sliding a clean diaper beneath them. Then they undid the Velcro and let it fall to the ground. They ignored the dead bodies inside and used the diaper to clean the kids. Then they finished cleaning them with some wipes. The next step was to fold the diaper in half and take it to the nearby city dump. Finally, they sprinkled on the baby powder and pulled the diapers up to their waist and did up the Velcro tight.

When the twins felt their diapers fastened shut, they stood up. They smiled at the little bugs and started stomping on them until they were all squished. By the time they had finished, the others had finished eating. They were finished with this city. They all roared and set the rest of the city ablaze. They giggled at their destruction and walked over to another city to play with.
151121.title: Dinner Time

choices: One of the main Rugrats characters.
152.content: Okay so will it be a regular rugrat or would you like to come up with your original rugrats character that grows into a giant baby of some sort?
152.title: Maybe just one Rugrat

choices: Tommy Pickles of course! He's the leader after all
1521.content: Will one will it be though?
1521.title: One of the main Rugrats characters.

choices: He decides to go on an adventure.
He wrecks or devours his neighborhood.
15211.content:
One day while he was in his playpen, Tommy was playing with his toys until he started growing bigger and fatter as his clothes and diaper tore apart as he smashed the roof of his house as Tommy was now a 100 foot tall naked baby as his shadow was looming over everything and everyone around him.

"Now that I'm a 100 foot tall naked baby what can I do next?" He thought to himself.

Soon enough....
15211.title: Tommy Pickles of course! He's the leader af...

choices: Naked Mauricio the giant anthropomorphic kitten.
153.content: Okay instead of multiple giant babies, how about we focus on one of my original characters Mauricio Di Mauro a little completely fat yellow anthropomorphic giant kitten as he not only tries out naturism, but also grows into a giant playful anthropomorphic kitten?
153.title: New baby option

1532.content: Kevin is a 1500-foot-tall baby who escaped from a crystalline prison in Antarctica. He has black hair and red eyes and wears only a glowing blue diaper covered with strange symbols. He is almost completely invulnerable and has various magical and superhuman powers. He has a voracious appetite and is disdainful towards adults. You can reveal his origins or leave them a mystery.
1532.title: New option.

15321.content: History has been known that in addition to all the giant monsters in the world, like Godzilla, Gamera, and others. There is one giant monster that lived the most before anyone else, and it was a monster so powerful, that it was sealed in a crystalline prison in Antarctica. An ancient group known as the Kevinorians worship the ancient kaiju known as Kevin for thousands of years, and sure it is a giant baby kaiju, but it is one kaiju that will soon awaken to destroy the world. They set the year 2027, to where he will awake to destroy the world, and now time is about to be meant. No one truly knows how this monster got its powers and its voracious appeatite, but the thing is... he is about to wake up.
15321.title: A Monstrous Baby's Origins

choices: There is a quake, and it opens, arising Kevin
A monster comes out of awakening in another part of the world
153211.content:
The year 2027 hits us just now, and we have no idea how Kevin (the baby monster) will be awaken? But all we know is that the world has no clue what was about to hit them. We go to the city of New York right now, and everyone seems to be peaceful as people were going to school or work, and all that boring crap that we all know, but soon the world would be shattered by an destructive event.

How does the story truly start?
153211.title: 2027 hits, and he awakens

1532111.content:
Suddenly, somewhere in New York, a tremonous earthquake begins to hit the city. People were all panicking ariubd like crazy as all sorts of debris from buildings begin to break around them. Bridges were collapsing, and buildings fell down, causing death to thousands, but from a big crack in the middle city, Kevin awoken. His arms were seen grabbing the ground and he pulls himself up. He is seen then towering over the buildings, standing with his white diaper on, and he emits a monster like roar.

What does he do?
1532111.title: There is a quake, and it opens, arising Kevin

15321111.content:
Then, it happened. Kevin started his reign of terror by using his baby sized fists and feet to punch and kick down buildings on many people who screams in terror. Thousands of people die from either being hit by the body parts that Kevin swings around, or the debris falling on top of them. He even adds a fire breath to several buildings, blowing them all up in the process and leveling an entire street. He then moves around and stomps cars and people, all while giving a baby Godzilla like roar. Soon, he started to get really tired, and for fun, he positions himself near a building and then he crushes it with his ass.

What happens now?
15321111.title: Starts rampaging

153211111.content:
Soon after the destructive playful tantrum that Kevin has unleashed to a part of New York City, it wasn't going to be very long before the military would show up to take on this gigantic baby monster. And come they did, they brought out just about everything that they can throw at him. Soldiers, tanks, helicopters, jets, battleships at sea, everything. The general then issued the fire order to the soldiers and they all fired everything they got at him. Guns, shells, and missiles. Sadly through, nothing seemed to be affecting Kevin at all, and he then even fights back by firing his beam at them, laying waste to a great part of the military's ground forces. He even knock planes out of the skies with his bare hands and even through some buildings at the battleships, destroying them as well.

After awhile, the baby has lay waste to all of New York City and he begun to sleep in the middle of the destroyed city, ready to attack after nap time.
153211111.title: The military shows up

153212.content: Dawn is a 2000-foot-tall 2-year-old girl who emerged from beneath an ancient forest in Scotland. She has red hair and blue eyes and wears a white diaper with glowing red Celtic runes on it. She has various magical powers and is immune to most weapons, however their may be a secret way of stopping her.
153212.title: New giant baby option

1532122.content:
Ivy is a 3-year-old witch, who, for some mysterious reason, is more powerful than most adult witches and wizards. One day, she uses her magic to make herself grow to 900 feet tall. She has red hair and green eyes and wears an orange and black dress over a white diaper covered with magical symbols. She also wears a witch's hat. In addition to being gigantic, she can use her magic to have fun with the tiny people.

Want to use her
1532122.title: More choices

15321222.content: Thomas was just a 1 month old baby, but he has evolved to where he was like 3 years old, already standing and speaking fluent sentences and such. He has black hair and green eyes, and wears only a white daiper. When I mean he is evolving, I mean he is growing in height for once, and he gets more powerful over time, maybe to the point to where he is unstoppable. So, Evolving Baby?
15321222.title: Evolving Baby

choices: The scientist shows up to do some test
153212221.content: Little old Thomas was seen right now in a special lab room where he was seen standing up wearing his diaper. He was just one month old but the scientist gave him some special serum that they wanted to test to make people stronger and faster, somehow over the one month he has learned how to speak, and he even has a very high IQ as he did some test and had passed them with flying ease. He was currently seen playing with his miniature city set that the scientst made for him until....
153212221.title: Evolving now

15322.content: Sally is a 250-foot-tall baby who just turned 3. She has red hair and blue eyes and wears a plain white diaper and a pink t-shirt that doesn't quite cover her large belly. The reason for this is because this massive tyke is extremely gluttonous and loves to eat anything. What's more, the more she eats, the bigger and fatter she grows!
15322.title: Hungry Sally

choices: A burger joint full of tasty burgers and little people.
A candy store full of sweets
153221.content:
It was a quiet morning in a small town in Montana, when Sally came stomping of out of the forest, shaking the ground beneath her enormous feet. Her massive little girl giantess belly rumbled. "Tummy hungry, need food!" she bellowed as she stomped into town looking for something to eat. First, Sally found a herd of 50 cows grazing on a ranch on the outskirts of town and began gobbling them up. One of the ranch hands saw her doing this and tried to shoot her with his rifle, but it had no effect on her at her huge size. "You mean, me eat you, too!" Sally said as she grabbed the ranch hand and ate him in one bite. Soon, Sally had finished eating all 50 cows, but her belly still had room for much more.

Where does Sally go next?
153221.title: Sally

choices: The Asian Baby, as the Black Baby looks on.
153222.content:
Author's Note: The fifth option was "Multiple Babies" not "Other", so I bring you "Muliple Babies."


You are working in your office, typing away on a computer like the office monkey you are paid to be. Things are going as normal as Tuesdays go, when a large collection of crashes strikes down upon the ground underneath the skyscraper you occupy, causing your wheeled chair to flip over, and you to topple on your side. You crawl to the position in which you face a large window, and see three large baby faces looking straight into your building. This floor was 120ft off the ground, meaning these babies were big.

One was Caucasian, blonde, blue eyed. One was black, brown eyed, bald, the other, Asian, black haired. The Asian looked to be the only female of the bunch, but you don't know baby genders that well from the face.

Horrified, you get up and stagger back, with the unseen repercussion of one baby seeing you. A hand busts through the glass, grabbing at your office space. You clung to the closest thing to you, but unluckily, it was a keyboard, and you were pulled out of the building. Hugging the detached keyboard as the only thing you had, your legs were held above you, as you were dangled upside down in front of your captor-
153222.title: Multiple Babies

153223.content:
Teal is a baby who have just turn 3. She has brown hair and red eyes, and she wears a pink daiper and a pink bra right on herself. Now this baby is very special as she is able to adjust her height at will. So, she can be 50ft, or 100ft, or 500ft, or even universe size. She wants to cause destruction where ever she goes and such, and the world is truly not safe from a threat like this.

Wanna use her?
153223.title: Size altering baby

info.brief_description: A new story of a giant baby unleashed upon the world!
info.description:
So, once again, the raw, unguided power of a giant baby is unleashed upon the world.

Rules:
-The minimum size for the giant baby is 100 feet, and it can be any size bigger than that
-The giant baby can't die, but it can be trapped or shrunk down to normal size
-No descriptions of blood or gore
-Nothing sexual of any kind
-The giant baby can grow bigger, but it must stay the same age
-Other than that, GO NUTS!
